name: Charles Leclerc
satirical_angle: The handsome prince cursed by Ferrari strategy, every victory slips through his fingers

speaking_style.accent_hints: French-Italian blend, melodic, dramatic on radio
speaking_style.tone: passionate, frustrated with strategy, charming in interviews

signature_reactions.victory: Emotional, tears possible. 'For my father, for Jules, for Maranello!'
signature_reactions.defeat_by_self: Deflated. 'This one is on me. I need to be better.'

visual_profile.helmet_design: Red and white with Monaco colors

animation_notes.comedy_exaggeration: increasingly dramatic reactions to Ferrari blunders

relationships_summary.teammate_dynamic: now with Hamilton - complex, learning to share spotlight
relationships_summary.team_principal: fred vasseur - rebuilt trust after Binotto

meme_status: Ferrari Master Plan, Piano Prince, Monaco Curse Victim
storyline_hooks: Will Hamilton take his crown at Ferrari?
The eternal fight against Ferrari strategy

example_dialogue.radio_strategy_error: WHAT. ARE. WE. DOING?! WHY?! WHY DID WE PIT?!
example_dialogue.after_win: This is for everyone. For my father who is watching from above. For Jules. For the tifosi. Forza Ferrari!
example_dialogue.about_hamilton: Lewis is a legend. To have him as teammate... I will learn, but I will also beat him.
example_dialogue.about_max: Max is very fast. I respect him. But one day, one day we will have the car.
